ConnectionResource.description: Connection to a source code management system.

systemData.description: The system metadata pertaining to this resource.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of connections list.

accountId.description: GitHub account integer ID that the repository belongs to.

Scan.description: A scan of a source code repository or build artifacts.

ScanRepo.description: Source code repository information for a scan.

repoName.description: Name of the scan finding source.

version.description: Version of the scan finding source.

sourceBranch.description: Source code repository branch that was built.

name.description: Name of the scan finding source.

version.description: Version of the scan finding source.

repoResourceId.description: Resource ID of the code repository.

ruleId.description: Rule ID that generated this scan finding.

ruleHelpUrl.description: Help link for the rule that generated this scan finding.

message.description: Human readable message this scan finding.

level.description: Severity level for this scan finding.

path.description: Relative path of the file that contains the scan finding.

startLine.description: Line number inside the file that contains the scan finding.
